## Goals

My goal is to build sustainability in outdoor recreation, so that people
can continue to enjoy nature for perpetuity. My thesis research is about
using Leave No Trace signage for soundscape management in National
Parks.

## Education

-   BS Recreation Management and Policy (University of New Hampshire
    '26)

-   Certificate in Geospatial Science (University of New Hampshire '26)

## Experience

-   Environmental Consulting

-   AmeriCorps Trail Crew
